mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.phone, u.status, u.nickname, u.realname, u.avatar, u.sex, u.create_time, g.name AS group_name FROM auth_user u LEFT JOIN auth_group_user gu ON u.id = gu.user_id LEFT JOIN auth_group g ON gu.group_id = g.id WHERE u.id = #{id}
